Translations.Text: Abange mmwe abakkiriza temubeeranga abo abaanyiiiza Musa (bwe baagamba nti aliko obulemu ku mubirigwe obumugaana okunaaba naffe) wabula Katonda yamutukuza ku ekyo kye baagamba era bulijjo wa kitiibwa ewa Katonda
Abange mmwe abakkiriza mutye Katonda era mwogere ebigambo ebituufu
Ajja kubalongooseza emirimu gya mmwe era abasonyiwe ebyonoono bya mmwe, era bulijjo omuntu agondera Katonda n’omubakawe aba yeesiimye olwesiima olusuffu

Mazima ffe twayagala obuvunaanyizibwa okubuwa eggulu omusanvu n'ensi n'ensozi naye nebigaana okubwetikka nebibwesamba, ye omuntu naabwetikka (naatatuukiriza era olw'ekyo) n'abeera eyeeyisa obubi atamanyi

Olwo nno Katonda alyoke abe nga abonereza abannanfusi abasajja n'abannanfusi abakazi, n’abasajja abagatta ku Katonda ebintu ebirala n’abakazi abagatta ku Katonda ebintu ebirala, era abe nga asonyiwa abakkiriza abasajja n’abakkiriza abakazi. Era bulijjo Katonda muyitirivu wa kusonyiwa muyitirivu wa kusaasira
